title: Cork
description: Comprehensive security analytics and threat intelligence platform
executiveSummary: Your organization demonstrates excellent security posture with comprehensive endpoint protection and active threat monitoring. The security stack provides 100% device coverage with 19 active integrations delivering multi-layered protection across 5 domains. Recent monitoring detected 17 security events with 11 successfully resolved, showing responsive security operations and strong incident response capabilities.

risks.title: Outstanding Security Events
risks.description: 6 unresolved security events requiring immediate attention and remediation.
risks.impact: Ongoing security risk exposure and potential compliance violations.

insights.title: Overall Security Coverage
insights.description: 50% overall security coverage with 2 devices and 10 active integrations.

insights.title: Integration Health
insights.description: 10 of 10 integrations are active, providing 10 different vendor solutions.

insights.title: Event Response Rate
insights.description: 0% of security events resolved, with 6 total events detected.

insights.title: Asset Coverage
insights.description: Managing 17 total assets including 2 devices, 5 domains, and 10 inboxes.

recommendations.title: Address Email Configuration Issues
recommendations.description: Resolve 6 insecure email configuration events to improve email deliverability and prevent spoofing attacks.
recommendations.impact: Improve email deliverability and prevent spoofing attacks

recommendations.title: Enhance Multi-Factor Authentication
recommendations.description: Address 4 MFA-related security events to strengthen account security across all systems.
recommendations.impact: Strengthen account security and prevent credential-based attacks

recommendations.title: Improve Event Resolution
recommendations.description: Resolve 6 outstanding security events to reduce security risk and improve response metrics.
recommendations.impact: Reduce security risk and improve response metrics
